subject: Baseball
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: Only four major leaguers with 3,000 hits have worn a Yankees uniform, but each got his 3,000th hit for another team. Only one wore it after achieving the milestone. Can you name him?
snippet: Only four major leaguers with 3,000 hits have worn a Yankees uniform, but each got his 3,000th hit for another team. Only one wore it after achieving the milestone. Can you name him?
